channel.title: Comments on: Ask Deemable Tech: How Can I Safely Shop Online?
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: Good advice RE: Online security! I've been using PC's since 1979, been on the internet before WWW was invented. Your show has merit. Provides good advice to people—both young and old— people who can barely keep up with the constant changes. Keep on truckin'!
item.content:encoded: Good advice RE: Online security! I’ve been using PC’s since 1979, been on the internet before WWW was invented. Your show has merit. Provides good advice to people—both young and old— people who can barely keep up with the constant changes. Keep on truckin’!
